text.name: longdescription
text.text: The Commodore 128, also known as the C128 is the last 8-bit home computer commercially released by Commodore Business Machines. CPU MOS8502 @2MHz Zilog Z80B @2MHz RAM 128KB Gfx VIC-II E (320×200, 16cl) MOS8563 (RGBI 640×200 16cl) Sound SID 6581/8580. Release date Jan '85.
